src/assert.h

00001 #ifndef ASSERT_H
00002 #define ASSERT_H
00003 
00004 #include <stdio.h>
00005 #include <stdlib.h>
00006 
00007 #define ASSERT(x...)                                                    \
00008   if (!(x))                                                             \
00009   {                                                                     \
00010     fprintf (stderr, "Error: '%s' [%s:%i]\n", #x, __FILE__, __LINE__);  \
00011     exit (EXIT_FAILURE);                                                \
00012   }
00013 
00014 
00015 #define SUCCESS_OR_DIE(f...)                                            \
00016   do                                                                    \
00017   {                                                                     \
00018     const gaspi_return_t r = f;                                         \
00019     if (r != GASPI_SUCCESS)                                             \
00020      {                                                                  \
00021        printf ("Error: '%s' [%s:%i]: %i\n", #f, __FILE__, __LINE__, r); \
00022        exit (EXIT_FAILURE);                                             \
00023      }                                                                  \
00024   } while (0)
00025 
00026 
00027 #endif
